<div class="parsedown-markdown"><p>知乎网页版给文章一些关键词添加了知乎直答链接，复制保存文章时也会将这些不必要的链接复制下来，故写了一个简单的 TamperMonkey 脚本将直答链接转为普通文字，使得笔记更清爽，请有需要的小伙伴按需使用：</p>
<pre><code class="language-js">// ==UserScript==
// <a href="https://www.52pojie.cn/home.php?mod=space&amp;uid=170990" target="_blank">@name</a>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;删除知乎文章中的直答链接
// <a href="https://www.52pojie.cn/home.php?mod=space&amp;uid=467642" target="_blank">@namespace</a>&nbsp; &nbsp; http://tampermonkey.net/
// <a href="https://www.52pojie.cn/home.php?mod=space&amp;uid=1248337" target="_blank">@version</a>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;2025-08-02
// @description&nbsp;&nbsp;删除知乎文章中的直答链接
// <a href="https://www.52pojie.cn/home.php?mod=space&amp;uid=686208" target="_blank">@AuThor</a>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; You
// <a href="https://www.52pojie.cn/home.php?mod=space&amp;uid=195849" target="_blank">@match</a>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/*
// <a href="https://www.52pojie.cn/home.php?mod=space&amp;uid=593100" target="_blank">@Icon</a>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;https://www.google.com/s2/favicons?sz=64&amp;domain=zhihu.com
// <a href="https://www.52pojie.cn/home.php?mod=space&amp;uid=609072" target="_blank">@grant</a>&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;none
// ==/UserScript==

(function() {
&nbsp; &nbsp; 'use strict';
&nbsp; &nbsp; let alla = document.querySelectorAll("a.RichContent-EntityWord");
&nbsp; &nbsp; alla.forEach(function(e,idx,array){
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;let par = e.parentElement;
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;let text = e.text;
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;e.remove();
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;par.textContent = text;
&nbsp; &nbsp; });
})();</code></pre></div>
